## Block.setDeletable() method

Set whether this block is deletable or not.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setDeletable(deletable: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  deletable | boolean | True if deletable. |

**Returns:**

void
